DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effect of diet-induced weight loss on the levels of circulating nutrients and hormones which are involved in feelings of hunger and satiety.
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Physiological Adaptations to Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: males and postmenopausal females aged over 18 years BMI 2740kg/m2 weightstable major comorbid medial condition (including diabetes) taking medications known to affect weight smoking
